title: RIP Anivia
body: Anivia is literally unplayable right now. Since the nerfs, Anivia has been unable to deal with champs with any type of mobility, considering that her ult e combo is now done. iT IS TOO MANA COSTLY TRY AND USE THE ULT E COMBO. And her q is one of the slowest skill shots in the game. She has no counterplay against assasins and cannot even lane against them. RITO PLZ. Buff anivia.

replies.body: as anivia main. anivia cant trade with such champions like viktor anni and ect. anymore since if she doesnt hit q its done for her. Now there are alot more usefull champs that can deal more damage with moving fighting area. Anivia need good team to make her new changes usefull and its not for soloq anymore. Hope rito will make changes back where Anivia could dial almost same damage as top tier apc.

Counterplay against assassins: Q them in the face at point-blank range. This is not an aurelion Q.
Stop blowing your cooldowns on dashing/untargetable champs.

Also drop your R right on top of you. 

They are assassins, you should at some point start getting a clue about how most kill you.
